title: Personal Portfolio
description: (Current Page) A reactive personal portfolio website meant to showcase my experiences, projects, and skills as a recent graduate Software Developer.

title: Excalibur Auction House
description: A live updating Auctions Page. This project was made in collaboration with five other students for the final project of our Web Development class at University at Buffalo.

title: PiM
description: A discord bot that analyses sentiment of server messages. This project was made to apply the skills I learned in my Text Mining for AI class at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam.
